item.name: Cast Iron Pan
item.description: * Reduce the difficulty of a SHOP check made _to make food edible or water potable_ by 1. * When using Unarmed Strike, you may deal +1 damage. * "Weapon" effects like this do not stack: only the highest damage bonus applies.
item.flavor: A large, heavy, black, cast iron pan. As effective against foes as it is against eggs.
